name: Lina_Adonais
content:
Lina Adonais was a female Qonto space urchin.
Lina Adonais was a young Qonto female who worked aboard the luxury liner Kuari Princess while touring the galaxy. She was an Alliance to Restore the Republic sympathizer, and considered joining the insurgency. During one voyage aboard the Kuari Princess, Adonais encountered a group of Alliance agents and saw through their disguises but promised not to reveal their identities.
Adonais was an unusually perceptive Qonto. After confirming the loyalties of the Alliance agents on board the Kuari Princess, she frequently ran into them asking for an update on their mission.
Adonais carried a hold-out blaster.
